name: dark-aura

effect.x_y: Strengthens dark moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Strengthens dark moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

short_effect: Strengthens dark moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
